entries.title: Baby Steps
html: These first few weeks were an interesting experience. I was stressing about making progress but am allowing myself to be distracted for a little bit. It ahs been great! Straight up I am looking to leverage AI were I jusdge it to be an assstance to what I am doing and not a replacemtn.
Next: camera smoothing and a one-button dash.

entries.title: Tiny movement win
html: Got a basic player move loop working in Godot. Slopes are wobbly (hello jitter) but it’s progress.
Next: camera smoothing and a one-button dash.

entries.title: Blocking out a tileset
html: Sketched a super simple 16×16 tileset to test collisions and scale. Looks bland (by design) but helped dial movement speed.
Parking style tweaks for later—goal is momentum, not polish.
